# PRD Build

Invoke the prd-builder agent for Product Requirements Document creation with guided Q&A and reference integration.

## Inputs

* ${input:topic}: (Required) Product or feature to document.
* ${input:references}: (Optional) Paths to source documents, stakeholder notes, or existing specs for integration.

---

Invoke prd-builder mode and proceed with the user's request.
